item.title: TikTok picked by FIFA as video content partner at 2026 World Cup
item.description: TikTok has been picked by FIFA as the first “preferred platform” for video content on social media at a men’s World Cup

item.title: Budget office expects Federal Reserve to cut rates in 2026
item.description: The Congressional Budget Office has released new economic projections, expecting the Federal Reserve to cut short-term rates in 2026

item.title: How Trump shook up defense stocks this week
item.description: President Donald Trump is causing some commotion for investors in U.S. defense contractors this week

item.title: Early birds can begin filing their taxes on Jan. 26 this year
item.description: The IRS will start accepting 2025 tax returns on Jan. 26, marking the official start of the 2026 tax filing season

item.title: Average US long-term mortgage rate edges higher but remains near 2025 low
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage edged higher this week to just above its 2025 low
